features: Scrub It Away: MARLOWE. deep cleansing bar soap for men uses apricot seed powder and ground pumice to buff away dryness for smooth, clean skin. This mens soap body wash bar gently lifts away dirt and rough skin without stripping natural moisture with the support of Shea Butter and Olive oil to aid in moisturization

Fresh Masculine Scent: Our Original exfoliating soap bar is lightly scented with agarwood, followed by a balance of sandalwood and musk. Experience the fresh invigorating scent of your favorite MARLOWE. scrub soap
Experience The MARLOWE. Difference: Our MARLOWE soap is crafted with apricot seed powder, ground pumice, shea butter, olive oil, and green tea. Designed to nourish, smooth, and revitalize skin

No Bad Stuff & Made Right Here: RSPO Certified,SLS/SLES and Paraben and phthalate-free, glycerin-based, cruelty-free and made in the USA. Bath soap wrapper made from 100% post-consumer recycled paper, FSC certified

The MARLOWE. Man: Men need hair & skin care too, but it doesn't have to be complicated. We believe that life is complicated enough. Looking good and feeling amazing shouldn’t have to be. MARLOWE. engineers products that work as hard as you do

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Highlights: These deep cleansing, exfoliating body soaps use pumice to buff away dryness for smooth, clean skin.After exfoliating, use our No. 002 Extra Moisturizing Body Lotion to nourish and hyrdrate your skin after exfoliating.

Smells Amazing: Our Variety Trio comes with our core scents: Original: Fresh and woodsy with light scents of pine and agarwood.Santal: Warm scent with layers of amber, spice, and citron.Oud Wood: Light, earthy blend of oud wood, smoked birch, cardamom, and vanilla.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skeptical but worth it
reviews.reviewText: I just got the "MARLOWE. No. 102 Men's Body Scrub Soap, Earthy Oud Wood Scent"Here is my Honest review after just showering with it:- Chunky Bar reminded me of a House brick 😂- The soap was a bit abrasive, but it started to feel good (especially on the back ^___^)- I had some oily skin buildup on my neck, collarbone, and chest... It's all gone! My neck and body feel like they have been replaced; they are spotless. Soft and smooth to the touch.- I LOVE Oud. I saw reviews of this strong soap bar, but it isn't. It smells weird, yet pleasant to me (like a soothing, relaxing scent). It's like a hotel bar of soap but doesn't give you a headache afterward 🤷‍♂️First bar is pretty good so far for a blind buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! Been using Marlowe for over a year now. Amazing scent and texture for exfoliating. At first it is a bit tough, but you can fix that by scrubbing it on a wash cloth for the first week. Definitely my favorite soap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pabout what i expected….
reviews.reviewText: This soap will leave your skin smoothe and exfoliated. Its great but i give it 4 stars for the price. Its not worth ten bucks in my opinion unless they were to send you 2 of them. But it does what it says it does. It exfoliates, smoothens skin and leaves you feeling great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have You Ever Used Sandpaper in the Shower?
reviews.reviewText: Here's my situation in a nutshell: I'm a hockey goalie and regular soap isn't good enough after playing. Does this remove all forms of stink? Yes. Does this soap leave you smelling "good" after you get out of the shower? A little bit - does seem to fade pretty quickly. (And I'm not sure I'd say it smells "woodsy", more flowery/fieldy.) Does this feel like you're showing with 80 grit sandpaper? Ohhhhhh yeah. I'm not a delicate person and I wouldn't say my skin is sensitive, but this soap is a bit intense for my liking. It does what it's supposed to do, but it's unpleasant to use on like your arms and legs. This would be great for hands after painting or using grease, but not as a body soap. Going to move this from the shower to the slop sink for when I'm done in the garage.Update: So I gave this a few more go rounds in the shower and I'm a convert. I love this. It did take some time to get used to it, but this is now my go to for the shower. Again, it is super intense when you first use it so I probably wouldn't suggest this as your first step into exfoliating soap, but if you're used to rougher exfoliating soaps, give it a whirl.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smelling soap
reviews.reviewText: The soap doesn’t melt like the bath soap you buy at the grocery store. My wife loves the scent and I feel refreshed after my shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great smell and texture
reviews.reviewText: It has a semi course texture but it’s not painful. You generally feel well scrubbed and clean without using body scrubbers. The smell is great and they last a while. My fiancés go to body bar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome last much longer than other brands
reviews.reviewText: I’ve found it to be an excellent product. The soap has a warm Santal scent that is not overpowering and leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean. In terms of longevity, these bars last easily over six weeks for me, which is significantly longer than other brands I’ve tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine for hands, but not so much your body
reviews.reviewText: The stuff smells great and I will keep it for washing my hands, but F using this thing in the shower. I don't consider myself 'soft,' but dang you need to be a masochistic to enjoy using this on your body in the shower outside your feet and hands lol.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent smell, a nice clean feeling; Only setback is the price
reviews.reviewText: I thought this soap was rather nice. It lathered just fine, smells excellent and has a slightly cinnamon sort of note to it. It doesn’t leave the body feeling oily and doesn’t dry out skin either which is good! The only complaint I have is how long the bar lasts compared to its price. I’m pretty sure this bar is an American product, but the bar only lasts maybe a month? Probably less depending how much one showers. I shower every day during the week since I am a welder and need to. Continuous use like this, it lasted just about a month. It would be nice if it either lasted longer (a thicker bar) or perhaps they added a second bar considering its high price point. I would recommend it for the scent and clean skin feeling, however the price is steep for the length of use you get out of the bar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews I thought I'll treat myself to an overpriced nice soap. There is absolutely nothing special about this soap. The smell is very average. Would have given it more stars if it weren't for the price. Honestly, it's not worth the price tag and I definitely won't be buying it again. Very disappointed...

I ordered this because of the reviews and it is an essential part of my bathroom regime. I use this in addition to my standard bar soap so I have two in the shower. I use this first as a scrub and then I use a different bar of soap to clean. It's great at especially washing y feet and has a mile fragrance that's not overpowering. Simply a men's grooming essential!
I tried this on a whim to help deal with an achene and ingrown hair issue it has worked brilliantly and it smells great to
Not too abrasive just enough granules to do the job done perfectly and leave me feeling refreshed after using
